Detailed Description

This is the interface for text to which markup objects can be attached and detached.

Not all Spannable classes have mutable text; see Editable for that.

This is the interface for text to which markup objects can be attached and detached.

 TextWidget* tv = new TextWidget(scene);
 String* text = new String("Spanable Text");
 tv->setText(text, TextWidget::SPANNABLE);
 Spannable* s = safe_cast<Spannable*>(tv->getText());
 s->setSpan(new ForegroundColorSpan(0xFF00FF00), 0, text->length(), 0);
